nodes.text: Ovolyan were bantha-sized reptilian quadrupeds native to Laboi II. They were the favorite prey of the Laboi, the fur-covered serpentine sentients who were the planet's dominant species. Interestingly enough, the Laboi were the favorite prey of the Ovolyan—but only the ones small enough for the toothless ovolyans to swallow whole. Nevertheless, hunting ovolyans was a dangerous endeavor, with many Laboi dying on the hunt despite their superior intelligence and pack-hunting tactics.
